Class BstToAvl

java.lang.Object
BstToAvl
public class BstToAvl extends Object
It is created for converting binary search tree to AVL tree

  • Method Details

    • wrapperConvertToAvl

      public <T extends Comparable<T>> BinarySearchTree<T> wrapperConvertToAvl(BinarySearchTree<T> bstree)
      It is wrapper function for converting the binary search tree to AVL tree
      Type Parameters:
      T -
      Parameters:
      bstree - the binary search tree to be converted
      Returns:
      the balanced binary search tree (AVL tree)

    • convertToAvl

      private <T extends Comparable<T>> void convertToAvl(BinarySearchTree<T> bstree, BinarySearchTree<T> realBST, T rootVal)
      First and second parameter are the binary search tree. One is used for recursive calls (sub-trees) and the other is used to find the parent of node on the real binary tree. Last parameter is used to determine root of the subtree is the root of the exact binary tree or not.
      Type Parameters:
      T -
      Parameters:
      bstree - the binary search tree - sub-trees -
      realBST - the real binary search tree
      rootVal - the value of the root of binary search tree

    • findParentNodeVal

      private <T extends Comparable<T>> void findParentNodeVal(BinaryTree.Node<T> node, Integer value, Integer parent, List<Integer> result)
      It finds the parent node value of the node with the given node value.
      Type Parameters:
      T -
      Parameters:
      node - the root of the tree
      value - the node value to be find its parent
      parent - the value of the parent
      result - the result includes parent value

    • rightRotate

      private <T extends Comparable<T>> BinaryTree.Node<T> rightRotate(BinaryTree.Node<T> node)
      Rotates the tree to the right for balancing. It returns the new root of the sub-tree.
      Type Parameters:
      T -
      Parameters:
      node - the root of the sub-tree
      Returns:
      the new root

    • leftRotate

      private <T extends Comparable<T>> BinaryTree.Node<T> leftRotate(BinaryTree.Node<T> node)

      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      private <T extends Comparable<T>> Integer findHeight(BinaryTree.Node<T> node)
